title: The Great Bookie Robbery
creator_credit: Marcus Cole, Mark Joffe, Ian Bradley and PBL Productions
brief_description: Three part mini series made in Melbourne in the late 1980s about the real life robbery of the Victoria Club in 1972. Several million dollars in cash was taken in a daring but meticulously planned armed hold up. As well as a stellar cast of well-known Australian actors, the city of Melbourne also fares well as a tough town underworld is exposed. This series dramatises the police investigation and details the more personal lives of the criminals including how the crime affects their partners, wives and family. Screenplay by Phillip Cornford. Photographed by Ellery Ryan. Music by David Skinner. Cast includes: John Bach, Catherine Wilkin, Gary Day, Bruno Lawrence, Scott Burgess, Andy Anderson, Gary Sweet, Candy Raymond, Madeline Blackwell, George Spartels, Ray Meagher, Paul Sonkkila, Frank Gallacher, Dennis Miller, Rebecca Rigg and Rebecca Gibney.
